section.name: Spread the word!
section.p: If you like Magnolia, one way to help us is to promote us - spread the word about Magnolia. Here are a couple of ideas.

subsection.name: Report Magnolia sites and success stories
subsection.p: If you have built a website with Magnolia, let us know about it. We provide an easy to use web interface to do so - simply fill out the blanks and we will add you to the growing list of references.

subsection.name: Write about Magnolia
subsection.p: If you have the possibility to write an article about Magnolia, do so. Publish it on your blog, your website or in a newspaper. Let us know about it, we might put a back link to it.

subsection.name: Talk about Magnolia
subsection.p: You are a conference speaker? Great! Talk about Magnolia - even if you only mention it, you will help Magnolia to gain more popularity. Of course, you are also welcome to speak about Magnolia on the Radio or the TV evening news. If all else fails, talk to your dog. It is unlikely to significantly promote Magnolia, but maybe it helps your dog.

subsection.name: Link to Magnolia
subsection.p: You have created a website with Magnolia or simply like what we do? Link to us! You can download the "Made with Magnolia" logo or simply put a link on your web page. Of course we are also happy if you let us know about your Magnolia site, so that we can link to you.
